name: Meet Me in Limbo
description:
Based on the 'Lost and Found' theme for the 2021 Global Game Jam, this is a small demo that challenges players to work together (or to work on your coordination if you play by yourself). When a set of twins are separated, you must help them to find each other again, but maybe not in the way that you would expect.

On GGJ here

Core gameplay, level design, player animation and art - Chloe Gooda

User Interface design, level design, audio, game animation/ cutscenes and art - Becky Reeve

** known bug: If one player hits an obstacle and both players stop moving, do not press the key of the direction you are moving in as this will break character movement! (you are still able to complete the game if this happens, but it is a known glitch)
